<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script>Boolean(event.parm1)</condition_script><description/><event_name>email.read</event_name><name>Wait for email notification to process</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[// Sets up an event loop that waits for the original email notification to finish processing
// If a Case was produced, we try to infer the Account field (if missing) based on the Customer Email Domain table
(function(event){
	// Get the email record
	var emailId = event.parm1;
	var emailGr = new GlideRecord('sys_email');
	emailGr.get(event.parm1);
	
	// Don't do anything if the email record couldn't be found
	if (!emailGr.isValidRecord()) return;
	
	// Don't do anything if the email was ignored or errored out
	if (emailGr.state == 'ignored') return;
	if (emailGr.state == 'error') return;
	
	// Replay this event with the same arguments one polling interval from now
	gs.eventQueue(
		'x_clgp_mail_to_acc.email_processing',
		emailGr,
		''
	);
})(event);]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Chris.Crockett@CloudGoServices.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-28 17:55:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>12357c2c1b67b010749f0dc5604bcb0e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Wait for email notification to process</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Email-based Account Assignment for CSM" source="x_clgp_mail_to_acc">136aa4d01bebb4101738a932604bcb5d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Email-based Account Assignment for CSM">136aa4d01bebb4101738a932604bcb5d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_12357c2c1b67b010749f0dc5604bcb0e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Chris.Crockett@CloudGoServices.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-29 17:52:12</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
